inputPlaceholders.linkToOpen: Link to open for this notification

alertMessages.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to cancel this scheduled notification?
alertMessages.cancelEditConfirmation: The upcoming event will be unchanged.
alertMessages.selectFutureDate: Select a future date and time more than 1 minute from now
alertMessages.failedToUpdate: Failed to update notification. Please try again.
alertMessages.failedToSchedule: Sorry, your notification could not be scheduled.
alertMessages.failedToUpdateGeneric: Sorry, your notification could not be updated.
alertMessages.maxNotificationsReached: Uh oh, you've reached the maximum of {{max}} scheduled notifications. You can delete an upcoming notification if you need to schedule a new notification.
alertMessages.maxNotificationsCapacityExceeded: Your phone limits the number of notifications that can be scheduled. To schedule this, you will need to delete {{needed}} notifications.
alertMessages.alarmWillBeRemoved: The alarm will be removed from this upcoming notification because this app no longer has permission to set alarms.
alertMessages.notificationPermissionRequired:
This app will not work until notifications are enabled.

{{instructions}}
alertMessages.alarmPermissionError:
Unable to request alarm permission: {{error}}

This may be a system issue. Please try again or restart the app.
alertMessages.permissionRequired: Please enable calendar access in your device settings.
alertMessages.configurationRequired:
Calendar permissions need to be configured. Please rebuild the app:

1. Stop the current app
2. Run: npx expo prebuild --clean
3. Rebuild and run the app
alertMessages.configurationError: Calendar permissions are not properly configured. Please rebuild the app after adding calendar permissions to Info.plist.
alertMessages.settingsInstructions: Please go to Settings > The Notifier > Calendar and enable access.
alertMessages.existingNotificationMessage: There's an upcoming notification for this. Do you want to create another one?
alertMessages.dailyAlarmMessage: To prevent your phone from stopping this daily alarm, you may need to use this app at least once every two week period after the start date.
alertMessages.weeklyNotificationMessage: To prevent your phone from stopping this weekly notification, you may need to use use this app at least once a month after the start date.
alertMessages.monthlyNotificationMessage: To prevent your phone from stopping this monthly notification, you may need to use use this app at least once a month after the start date.
alertMessages.yearlyNotificationMessage: To prevent your phone from stopping this yearly notification, you may need to use use this app at least once a year after the start date.
alertMessages.alarmSchedulingWarning: The notification was scheduled, but there was a problem scheduling the alarm: {{error}}
alertMessages.notificationPermissionRemovedCleanup: The Notifier has detected that it no longer has permission to schedule notifications and alarms. As a result, upcoming notifications have been removed.
alertMessages.alarmPermissionRemovedCleanup: The Notifier has detected that it no longer has permission to schedule alarms. As a result, alarms have been removed from your upcoming notifications.

popupMessages.calendarUpdatesMessage: We found updates to your calendar that might affect your upcoming notifications. You should review them and make edits if needed.

errorMessages.calendarEventNotFound: Calendar event not found. Please check your calendar app.
errorMessages.unableToGenerateCalendarLink: Unable to generate calendar link for this platform.
errorMessages.unableToOpenCalendarEvent: Unable to open calendar event. Please open your calendar app manually.

emptyStates.noEventsFound: No events found for the next 30 days

calendarScreen.eventRemoved: This event was removed from your calendar
